column4: also I miss having a running performance monitor in the dock, all you get are static icons from dasher
Is there any way to add things to the top bar? next to volume and such?
no  unless you find new indicators...take a look here for a few things to do    http://www.webupd8.org/2011/04/things-to-tweak-fix-after-installing.html
the upper panel is NOT a gnome panel  anylonger at least not in Unity
